publications.name: Robotic Swarm With Independent Selection of Master-Slave Configuration
publications.publisher: 2024 IEEE Syscon Systems Council Student Event
publications.summary: This paper proposes a novel decentralized control architecture for robotic swarms, inspired by social insect behavior. By enabling robots to dynamically select master-slave configurations based on local information and optimize resource allocation, the system enhances swarm adaptability, robustness, and efficiency in complex and dynamic environments.

publications.name: Mind Controlled Bionic Arm with Sense of Touch [8 class version]
